items.ja: 'I woke up this morning with no nerves' - Clarke hails Scotland players
items.en: 'I woke up this morning with no nerves' - Clarke hails Scotland players
items.text_for_match: 'I woke up this morning with no nerves' - Clarke hails Scotland players Head coach Steve Clarke hails his Scotland players after they qualify for a first men's World Cup since 1998. Head coach Steve Clarke hails his Scotland players after they qualify for a first men's World Cup since 1998.

items.ja: Who has qualified for World Cup and when is draw?
items.en: Who has qualified for World Cup and when is draw?
items.text_for_match: Who has qualified for World Cup and when is draw? Our Ask Me Anything team explore when the World Cup draw is, how the seeding works and who has qualified so far. Our Ask Me Anything team explore when the World Cup draw is, how the seeding works and who has qualified so far.
